Game: The Incredible Hulk 2008-06-05T00:00:00-07:00 The Incredible Hulk is an action game developed by Probe Entertainment and released on Game Boy Advance, GameGear, Microsoft Windows, Nintendo DS, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, Sega Genesis, Sega Master System, Super Nintendo Entertainment System, Wii, Xbox 360. 2 <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/b0792260-0bee-41b1-b376-b62cc6760430.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/415b6a9e-ed2a-4275-9d82-4cd40798afaf.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/de5febe3-9a51-42b5-a0b9-0ced2ca8cd54.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Incredible_Hulk_(2008_video_game) E10+ - Everyone 10+ Action Amaze Entertainment Sega
